name: Client Onboarding Automation

parameters.subject: Welcome to [Company Name]! - Your Onboarding Journey Starts Now
parameters.message:

We're thrilled to have {{ $json.company_name }} join us

Hi {{ $json.contact_name }},

Thank you for choosing [Company Name]! We're excited to partner with you and help achieve your goals.

Your Onboarding Timeline

Today: Welcome package and intake questionnaire
{{ $json.kickoff_date }}: Kickoff call (60 min)
{{ $json.setup_complete_date }}: System setup complete + training
{{ $json.checkin_date }}: 2-week check-in call

What's Next?

  1. Complete the intake questionnaire (link below) - takes about 10 minutes
  2. Book your kickoff call using the scheduling link
  3. Gather any brand assets, logins, or documents we discussed
Complete Intake Questionnaire

Your dedicated account manager will reach out within 24 hours to introduce themselves.

Questions? Reply to this email or call us at [phone number].

Looking forward to working together!

The [Company Name] Team

Your Client ID: {{ $json.client_id }}

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, client_id: $json.client_id, message: 'Client onboarding initiated successfully' }) }}
